events.title: Årskonference for undervisere på videregående uddannelser
events.description: Kom og oplev Nikolaj Sonne fra DR2’s tech-program ”So ein Ding”, som på årets konference gør os klogere på kunstig intelligens og, hvad der driver disse tankeprocessorer. Efter foredraget vil der være workshops, hvor du sammen med andre undervisere fra videregående uddannelser debattere og diskutere konkrete dilemmaer.

events.title: Symposium on AI Opportunities and Challenges (SAIOC)
events.description: This one-day online Symposium will bring together a range of thought leaders in the field of Artificial Intelligence who will collectively explore the current state of AI as it is applied in education.

events.title: CLAI opening seminar
events.description: CLAI invites to its opening seminar on September 20th at Aarhus University, where the theme is the state-of-the-art of Large Language Models.

events.title: AI Denmark Summit
events.description: Er du klar til at omfavne mulighederne inden for kunstig intelligens? Og savner du inspiration til, hvordan man bedst anvender teknologien?

events.title: Digital Tech Summit
events.description: Digital Tech Summit – AI Transforming Business 2023 is the largest deep tech conference in the Nordic countries and the annual meeting place for researchers from the country's universities, their partners in Danish industry, startups and students from all danish universities.
